name: template-fullstack
description: project template for the React-Express-MySQL cursus in Wild Code School

scripts.setup: npm i && husky install && npm --prefix ./frontend i && npm --prefix ./directus i
scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./frontend run dev" "cd directus/ && npx directus start"

author: Wild Code School
